title: Digitizing Geology, From Exploration to Production

markdown.headingText: Digitizing Geology, From Exploration to Production
markdown.markdown:
::: {.container .page-content} ::: {.text-center .hero-intro} Professional R Shiny applications for modern geology. We provide an advanced geological analysis suite—including GeoDataViz, Resource Estimation, and Pit Optimization tools—for professional geoscientists and mining engineers. Built by geologists, for geologists.
Launch GeoDataViz Demo Read Technical Guides
::: ::: {.section-container .text-center} ## Why Orebit Solutions? Access enterprise-level tools without the enterprise-level costs. We bridge the gap between powerful analytics and accessibility. ::: {.value-props-grid} ::: {.value-item}
### Cost-Effective Excellence Eliminate prohibitive $20,000+ annual licensing fees. Powerful tools should be accessible to all, not just the largest corporations. ::: ::: {.value-item}
### Built by Geologists Developed by a Certified Competent Person (CP) who understands the real-world challenges and workflows of the mining industry. ::: ::: {.value-item}
### Open & Transparent Built on open-source R technology. No black-box algorithms. Our methods are clear, ensuring reproducibility and scientific integrity. ::: ::: {.value-item}
### Cloud-Native Performance No installation, no maintenance. Run sophisticated analyses directly in your browser, anywhere, on any device. ::: ::: ::: ::: {.section-container .section-light-bg}

Our Product Suite

::: {.products-grid} ::: {.product-card .flagship}

GeoDataViz

Available Now
Transform your geological workflow with professional-grade exploratory data analysis and 3D visualization, built specifically for drillhole datasets. Launch Free Demo → ::: ::: {.product-card .upcoming}

Resource Estimation

Coming Q2 2026
Professional geostatistical analysis and resource modeling. Advanced kriging, variogram modeling, and uncertainty quantification. Join Beta List → ::: ::: {.product-card .upcoming}

Pit Optimizer

Coming Q3 2026
Sophisticated mine planning and optimization algorithms. Maximize NPV while considering operational constraints and environmental factors. Get Notified → ::: ::: ::: ::: {#cta-section .section-container .cta-section .text-center} ### Ready to Transform Your Workflow? Stay updated on our upcoming resource estimation and pit optimization tools.
::: :::
